programme.title: Watch out for Isidore
programme.short_synopsis: It’s all in the name for Alistair Cooke as he ponders hurricane titles and biblical names.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke ponders names - the names of hurricanes, black Christian names and biblical names, as well as phonetics and the recital alphabet.
